daily_fact: Nydia’s godchildren are actively involved in community service, showcasing the importance of mentorship and support in fostering strong, resilient neighborhoods throughout New York City.
topline_md: Amid extreme cold in NYC, a 94-year-old woman is missing, two men were found dead in subway trains, and record gas usage has been reported; meanwhile, Mayor Mamdani is addressing budget crises and public safety concerns, including a new ICE response team and changes in police policies.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
